segments.text: Yes , one last thing . How much holiday time do you give your employees every year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our employees receive fifteen days of paid vacation every year . If you don ’ t use the full fifteen days , they carry over to the following year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You get five paid sick days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we have an excellent retirement plan and medical insurance as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Thanks so much for your time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ ll contact you soon , Ted . Thanks for coming in .
segments.speaker: S1
